with a as ( SELECT distinct PROVIDER, 8717 as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_CONCEPT_ID, 'Inpatient Hospital' PLACE_OF_SERVICE_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.MEDPAR union SELECT distinct PROVIDER, 8756 as PLACE_OF_SERVICE_CONCEPT_ID, 'Outpatient Hospital' PLACE_OF_SERVICE_SOURCE_VALUE FROM {sc}.OUTSAF )
